attributes.action: Remove the use of horses from the police task force
attributes.additional_details: Because they’re are more than one way to control people and using animals as a way to control large numbers of people is out dated and unsafe. More harm is caused to them by using them to in force control rather than to safeguard people
attributes.background: To remove the use of horses from the metropolitan police and their uses for protest control

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of horses in the police force: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325179

Ban the use of horses for crowd control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325275
